release_notes: Release 4.1.0 - 2025-08-08\✨ New Features:\  • feat: implement dynamic version badge and enhance feature card spacing\  • feat: add --hide-fallback-resources flag to disable fallback resource display\  • feat: comprehensive documentation overhaul and code quality improvements\🐛 Bug Fixes:\  • fix: repair feature card links and enhance row separation\  • fix: resolve YAML syntax error in release workflow and update CLI documentation\  • fix: update release workflow to use VERSION_BUMP_WORKFLOW PAT token\💄 Style Changes:\  • style: finalize feature card row separation with enhanced responsive spacing\  • style: implement proportional spacing for feature cards without breaking functionality\  • style: improve viewport spacing and layout for better readability\  • style: apply Black code formatting across entire codebase\📊 Summary: 10 commits in this release\🔀 Triggered by PR #23
